summary:
This mod adds standalone female Hitokiri follower "Tomoe and Izo" to your Skyrim. When you introduce this mod, other mods are not necessary.
They are marriageable, essential. You can find her at Jarl's Longhouse in Falkreath.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Rl2NzPJ.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/gGSrTWZ.jpg[/img][/center]
[size=3pt][color=#cc0000]This follower mod is standalone.[/color][/size]
When you introduce this mod, other mods are not necessary.

[color=#cc0000]Tomoe and Izo[/color] are swordswoman who came to Skyrim from the far country.
Their status by birth is unknown, but she has a natural talent of sword skills. 
[color=#cc0000]Hitokiri's motto: 'Killing with one thrashing'[/color]

They are called [color=#cc0000]"Hitokiri"[/color]. Hitokiri's specialty is slaying a human and can be found at [color=#cc0000]Jarl's Longhouse in Falkreath.[/color]

[size=3pt][color=#cc0000]Version Information:[/color][/size]
1.0 Initial version?
1.0.1 Fixed Weapon Textures + No Scar Patch
1.0.2 Facial Scar / No scar selectable (29th Sep. 2013)
1.1 Minor update(1st Oct. 2013)
・Jirotachi and Tomoe's strength down
・Retexured Black Hakama / Red Scarf / Retexured Jirotachi selectable
1.1 CME_Data Added(3rd Nov. 2013)
1.2 Minor update (24 Nov. 2013)[/color]
・Hair style changed /Retexured Hakama and Scarf
・CME_Data Added
[size=3pt][color=#cc0000]1.3 Updated (19th May, 2014)[/color][/size]
[color=#cc0000]・New facial model and combat styles (Asura(1hand or Dual) / Rakshasa(2hands))[/color]
[color=#cc0000]・New Weapons and Outfits (Mikazuki Munechika / Kotetsu / Menpou / Tebukuro)[/color]
[color=#cc0000]weapons and armor tempering available except for Menpou and Scarf.

[/color][color=#00ffff][size=3]V02 Updated
Tomoe: New Facial model added.
Izo      : New![/size][/color]

[size=3pt][color=#cc0000]Profile :[/color][/size]
[color=#00ffff]V02  Tomoe and Izo[/color]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/FfaoIKF.jpg[/img][/center]

It is available with a console
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/V5bVymb.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=3pt][color=#cc0000]Installation :[/color][/size]
Please do CLEAN INSTALL and LOAD ORDER optimization.
[NMM]
Download via NMM or drag the archive into NMM and activate.
Please select body type (UNP/UNPB/CBBE) and Combat type and face model with installer(fomod).
[Manual]
Unpack the archive and copy the contents into your Skyrim install folder, and activate in Data Files (File: 00 MainAsura or Rakshasa (Default: UNP) when loading Skyrim.

[size=3pt][color=#cc0000]Uninstallation :[/color][/size]
Dismiss them from your active followers.
[NMM]
Deactivate the mod in NMM and delete.
[Manual]
In your Skyrim Data directory, delete the following files & folders.

[size=3pt][color=#cc0000]Recommended Mods :[/color][/size]
